description: Archon Studio has recently announced a new tabletop wargame, Heroes of Might & Magic: Battles, designed in collaboration with industry veterans Jervis Johnson and Andy Chambers, along with Archon’s Jacek Karpowicz. This game aims to translate the strategic gameplay of the popular video game series Heroes of Might & Magic into a tabletop format. Jervis...
title: Archon Studio Announces New Tabletop Game: Heroes of Might & Magic: Battles

description: Dice Dungeons has launched a Kickstarter campaign for “80’s Adventures,” a supplement for 5th edition Dungeons & Dragons, drawing inspiration from everyone’s favorite decade, the 1980s. 80’s Adventure introduces a series of new subclasses, magic items, and spells that capture the spirit of the decade. Each class receives a new subclass that mirrors an iconic...
title: Travel Back to the 1980s with “80’s Adventures”: A Retro 5E Supplement & Adventure Module – On Kickstarter Now
